text.value: A member of my own household

_Explain to the person you are interviewing that for the next 10 minutes, you will ask them a few questions about their household. The data is important because it helps the CHWs and leadership to improve design and review of our programmes so that we are able to improve care to all people in the district._
_When you finish the interview, please remember to thank the interviewee._
Does any member of this household have a bank account?
Where do you usually charge the phone from.
Does anyone in the household have a functioning mobile phone that is accessible for use by household members.

Considering your household wealth, education, community influence and other aspects considered important in your community. What position would you rank your household relative to the community you live in?
Have any children in this household attended school up to class 8?
Has anyone in this household completed five or more years of schooling?
What type of fuel does the household mainly use for cooking?
During the last 12 months, did you or other members of your household have to borrow money or sell assets in order to pay for medical costs?
I can get all the health services I need in Neno.
The last time you went to clinic how did you travel?
Specify other means of transport to health facility.
How comfortable would you be discussing your own Covid experience with your health care provider.
How many women (30-49 Years) in this household have been screened for cervical cancer?
Have you ever reported any covid related symptoms to the CHWs during the year.
Over the past year, the services such as tests and medications, at my nearest health facility have improved
Does anyone in the household sometimes have fits, become rigid, or lose consciousness?
Did any girl(s) in the household receive the HPV vaccine this year?
Has the household been sprayed with insecticides within the last 12 months?
Is anyone in the household malnourished?
_Refer to facility for evaluation for epilepsy._
Over the past year, my confidence in my health provider has improved
Regarding the nearest health facility to me, I would recommend a friend attend this clinic if they are sick.
How long did it take you to reach the health facility?
None cannot be selected with any other option!
Do all the sleeping points in the household have an insecticide-treated net (ITN)?
How many women in the household are aged 30-49 years
None cannot be selected with any other option!
Does this household have any of the following items that are functioning:
What is the main material of the floor of the dwelling?
What is the main material of the roof of the dwelling?
_This is a household survey that will be happening once or twice a year and the target is to reach all households in your catchment area._
_It is important that you collect all information correctly._
_You are expected to reach ALL your assigned households._

_Please interview the household head (father or mother). If not available, interview a household member who is 18 years and above who can provide the required information. Note the person you will be getting the information from. If there is no one, make plans to revisit the house._
_Please ensure that GPS is turned enabled on your phone when you are starting the interview._
As the CHW are you satisfied with the responses given
What is your main source of drinking water?
Does this household have a hand washing facility?
Does the household share toilet facility with other households?
Does the handwashing facility have soap?
How long does it take to walk to the drinking water source?
What type of toilet facility is mainly used by the household members?
What is the primary method used to treat the household's drinking water?
Pakhomo limodzi la manyuma amene ndili nawo

_Mufotokozereni munthu amene mukulankhulana nayeyo kuti mukhala mukucheza naye kwa mphindi khumi kumufunsa mafunso okhudzana ndi pakhomopo. Uthenga umene mukutolerawo ndiwofunikira kwambiri popititsa patsogolo ntchito ya za umoyo m'boma la Neno._
Pali wina aliyense pa banja pano yemwe ali akaunti ya ku banki?
Kodi alipo pano amene ali ndi foni ya m'manja yoti ikugwira ntchito ndipo imagwiritsidwanso ntchito ndi anthu ena pakhomo pano?

Mukalingalira chuma chomwe muli nacho pakhomo lino, maphunziro anu komanso zinthu zimene zimasonyeza kufunikira kwanu m'mudzi muno, mutakhala kuti mwadziyeza pa sikelo, mukuwona kuti mungagwe patipati mofananiza ndi mabanja ena m'mudzi muno?
Ngati imakatchajidwa kwina, fotokozani kuti ndi kuti?
Pali ana omwe anafikapo sitandande 8 ali pa sukulu?
Alipo wina aliyense pa banja pano yemwe anafika zaka 5 kapena kuposera ali pa sukulu?
Fotokozani mtundu wina wa mafuta ophikira
Kodi banja lino limagwilitsa ntchito njira yanji pophika?
Miyezi khimo ndi iwiri yapitayi munabwereka ndalama kapena kugulitsa katundu wa mnyumba kuti muthe kulipira kuchipatala?
Nditha kupeza thandizo lina liri lonse la za umoyo mu Neno
Ulendo womaliza womwe munapita ku chipatala, munagwilitsa ntchito mayendedwe otani?
Fotokozani zina mwa njira za mayendedwe opitira ku chipatala
Kodi mungakhale womasuka kukambira ndi wina aliyense wa za umoyo mutakhala kuti mukumva zizindikiro za Covid-19?
Kodi ndi amayi angati a zaka za pakati 30 mpaka 49 mnyumba muno omwe anafufuzidwa ngati ali ndi khansa ya khomo la chiberekero?
Kodi inuyo mwafotokozerako alangizi a za umoyo (CHW) za zizindikiro zina zili zonse za Covid-19 chaka chino?
Kwa chaka chapitachi, thandizo la chipatala monga kuyeza matenda komanso thandizo la mankhwala ku chipatala chomwe ndiri nacho pafupi lakhala likupita pa tsogolo
Kodi alipo wina mnyumba muno amene amaonetsa zizindikiro monga kukomoka, kapenanso kuuma thupi?
Kodi mtsikana/atsikana a mnyumbamo alandira katemera oteteza ku matenda a khansa ya khomo ya chiberekero chaka chino?
Mwapoperako mankhwala opha tizilombo m'nyumba mwanu kwa miyezi 12 yapitayi?
Alipo yemwe wanyentchera pa banja pano?
_Tumizani odwala kuchipatala kuti akamuone ngati ndi khunyu._
Kwa chaka chapitachi, chikhulupiliro changa pa anthu opereka thandizo la za umoyo chakhala chikukulirakulira
Poyang'anira chipatala chomwe ndiri nacho pafupi, nditha kumulimbikitsa nzanga kupita ku chipatala chimenechi ngati wadwala
Kodi zinakutengerani nthawi yaitali bwanji kuti mufike kuchipatala?
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale china
Kodi mu zipinda zonse zogona mnyumba muno muli ma net onyikidwa ku mankhwala?
Kodi ndi akazi/amayi angati pakhomo pano amene ali ndi zaka zosachepera 30 koma zosapitilira 49
Nkhani zokhunza umoyo wa pa banja
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale china
Kodi pakhomo pano muli ndi zinthu izi zoti zikugwira ntchito
Kodi pansi pa nyumba yanu munamangira ndi chani?
Kodi denga la nyumba yanu inafoleledwa ndi chani
_Uyu ndi kafukufuku amene adzichitika kamodzi kapena kawiri pa chaka amene akuyenera kufikira manyumba onse amene muli nawo m'dera lanu._
_Ndikofunikira kwambiri kuti mulembe mayankho onse molondola._
_Mukuyenera kufikira manyumba anu onse ndi kafukufukuyi._

_Chonde lankhulani ndi mutu wabanja za kafukufukuyi. Ngati palibe, lankhulani ndi munthu wa pakhomopo wa zaka 18 kupita m'tsogolo amene angapereke mayankho oyenera. Fotokozani kuti mwalankhula nayeyo ndi ndani ndipo ngati palibe oti mulankhule naye, konzani kubweleranso panyumbayo._
_Wonetsetsani kuti GPS yanu ndiyoyatsidwa pa foni yanu pamene mukulankhula ndi munthu pakhomo lina lili lonse komanso pamene mukutumiza fomu yakafukufukuyi._
Monga CHW mukukhutira ndi mayankho omwe aperekedwa
Kodi pa banja lino pali chosambira m'manja?
Kodi chimbuzi chanu mumalowanso anthu ena?
Kodi pa chosambira m'manja pamakhala sopo?
Mumayenda nthawi yayitali bwanji kuti mufike komwe mumatunga madzi akumwa?
Kodi anthu a pa banja pano amagwilitsa ntchito mtundu wanji wa chimbuzi?
Madzi anu akumwa pa banja pano mumawateteza bwanji?
